attributes.action: Scrap St Albans District Council and towards a unitary authority for Hertfordshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
St Albans district council has 58 councillors. Assuming this is mirrored throughout the rest of Hertfordshire are we being over governed? Given the historical low turnout in local elections does this show the public apathy towards this system? 
Is it time to move towards a more centalised strategic system which takes into account the need of the whole county?
